name: Verify Door System
description: Validates that all doors open and close correctly using their interaction buttons.
testObjective: Ensure door mechanics work consistently across all door types in the ship.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in ship hallway area
Multiple doors are available for testing

steps.action: Interact with the main door button using E
Interact with the same button again
Test opening and closing the main door multiple times
steps.expected: Door consistently opens and closes without issues

steps.action: Interact with a secondary hallway door button
Attempt to close the secondary door using its button
steps.expected: Door closes properly (verify if this is supported)

steps.action: Try clicking directly on door mesh instead of button
steps.expected: Verify if door opens (some doors have this behavior)

postconditions: Door interaction is consistent across door types
